name: im
description:
iF yOu LoVe WhAt YoU dO yOu'Ll NeVeR wOrK a DaY iN yOuR lIfE

im is a claustrophobic experimental game and/or a short interactive movie about surveillance culture in the workplace.

Made by a one-person dev "team" in two days.
Credits music is "Return of the Space Cowpoke Part 2" from my album Distant Signals Vol. 6

Created for LOWREZJAM 2020

Controls
Arrow Keys - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot/Disarm Mine

Fullscreen and headphones highly recommended.
Windowed mode highly discouraged (see below)

Known Bugs & Issues:
- Game runs inaccurately in windowed mode, please run in fullscreen
- Graphics render incorrectly in windowed mode, please run in fullscreen
- Music sometimes does not initialize at title screen (Windows)
- macOS version is not fully tested
